mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bcomment_tb (bcomment_idx,board_idx,user_idx,content) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(bcomment_idx),0)+1 FROM bcomment_tb), #{board_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.bcomment_idx,b.board_idx,b.user_idx,b.content, TO_CHAR(b.created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created,u.id FROM bcomment_tb b LEFT JOIN user_tb u ON b.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE b.board_idx = #{board_idx} ORDER BY b.bcomment_idx DESC
